value.name: 'He killed my love' | Woman recounts moments leading up to south-side shooting between police and gunman
value.description: His girlfriend, Krystal Vela, was there when police killed the suspect, who has since been identified as Brian DeLeon. "They kept telling him to put the gun down," she said. "But he wouldn't do it.
